mapper.insert: insert into match values(seq_matchno.nextval, #{teamHome}, null, #{matchDate}, #{matchTime}, #{matchType}, #{playGround}, default, default, #{cost}, #{matchContent}, #{lat}, #{lng}, default)
mapper.select: select count(*) as c, to_char(matchdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cc from match where teamaway is not null group by to_char(matchdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) as f, to_char(matchdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ff from match where teamaway is null group by to_char(matchdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

select m.*,(select teamemblem from team where m.teamhome=teamname)as homeemblem, (select teamemblem from team where m.teamaway=teamname)as awayemblem from match m where m.matchdate=#{matchDate} and teamaway is not null ORDER BY MATCHDATE ASC

select m.*,(select teamemblem from team where m.teamhome=teamname)as homeemblem,(select teamlocation from team where m.teamhome=teamname)as location from match m where m.matchdate=#{matchDate} and teamaway is null ORDER BY MATCHDATE ASC

select m.*,(select teamemblem from team where m.teamhome=teamname) as emblem,(select teamlocation from team where m.teamhome=teamname)as location, (select teamtype from team where m.teamhome=teamname) as teamtype, (select teamcolor from team where m.teamhome=teamname) as uniform,(select count(*) from memberbyteam where m.teamhome=teamname)as teamcount,(select teamcontent from team where m.teamhome=teamname)as introduce from match m where m.matchno=#{matchNo}
select * from memberbyteam mbt left join member m on(mbt.memberid=m.memberid) where mbt.teamname=#{teamName}
mapper.insert: update match set teamaway = #{awayTeam} where matchno=#{matchNo}
